name: Lead Screaming
description: Aggressive screaming lead with heavy modulation and filter resonance

performance.notes: Aggressive screaming FM lead using Algorithm 5 (complex feedback). Cascading modulation chain: Op6 → Op5 → Op4 → Op3 → Op2 → Op1. Very high modulation indices (20, 12, 8, 5, 3). Operator 1 feeds back to operator 2 (feedback loop). High ratios (1, 1, 2, 4, 8, 13) create extreme harmonics. Resonant filter (0.85) adds scream. Filter envelope adds movement. Creates biting, aggressive lead.
performance.technique: Algorithm 5 = complex feedback. High modulation indices = aggression. Cascading modulation creates complexity. Feedback loop adds chaos. High ratios = extreme harmonics. Resonant filter = scream. Perfect for trance leads.
performance.tip: High modulation indices = brighter, more aggressive. Feedback loops add chaos. Resonant filter adds scream. Filter envelope adds movement.

algorithmDescription: Algorithm 5: Complex feedback structure with cascading modulation
